name: Supresion - La Querra Comenzo (Thrash Metal)
description:
Sold out across the globe, we have the very few remaining copies, only at Metal For A Dark World!
This hard to find classic thrash EP by Supresion is their 2nd release, and contains 4 songs of classic Bay Area style thrashing metal.  If you like Exodus, Forbidden, Defiance, and Death Angel, then this one is FOR YOU!  The last remaining 10 copies in the world, on sale for a special price!  Get it NOW before it is NO LONGER AVAILABLE ANYWHERE!  Not available anywhere on digital download either!
***NEW***Sealed***

Track Listing:
1.  Intro
2.  Tiempo Final
3.  Crossing The Narrow Path
4.  Voz Que Clama En El Desierto

(c) Martyrdom Records

name: Dark Night - Night of Halloween (Dark Horror Metal)
description:
Only 5 of these left - the only original copies left in the entire world!  Act now before they are GONE FOR GOOD!!

The debut CD from Brazil's Dark Night is an opus of dark, traditional style metal in the vein of King Diamond and Mercyful Fate, and lead vocalist Noctuerna Grave Digger's voice has the same abilities to sing very low, almost growl, to screaming high-pitch horrific screeches!  With titles such as "Night Of Halloween", "The Tale Of The Family Ghost", and "The Secret Society of Shadows", you are in for a spooky, head-banging thrill ride for sure!
This is horror metal at it's finest - definitely something to play For A Night Of Halloween!!!  
***NEW***Sealed***

Track listing:
1.  Night Of Halloween
2.  The Tale of the Family Ghost
3.  Midnight Vampire
4.  A Dead Love
5.  Sarah Alone
6.  The Secret Society of Shadows
7.  Halloween Spell
8.  Lost In The Shadows
9.  Abandoned in the Graveyard
10. Conspiracy
11. The Illuminati
12. Cemetary Night

name: Neizbezhnost - "Would It Be Reasonable..."  MP3 Digital Download (full album) (Black Metal)
description:
(c) 2011 Metal For A Dark World

CD Sold out!!  

Debut full-length album from the Ukrainian black metal band Neizbehnost.  Contains 10 songs of blistering black metal fury  that transports the listener back to the dark days of early 1990's harsh melodic black metal that is haunting in breath yet chilling in scope!

This is the digital download, high quality MP3 version of the album, no booklet, no cd.  One you have made the purchase, you will be emailed a link to download the album within 24-48 hours of placement of order.  There are no shipping charges for this product.

Sorry, for this item, due to the fact that it's electronic and MP3 files, we cannot accept returns or give refunds for this product.  However, if you are having issues with downloading the file or unzipping/extracting the zipped file, we can and will assist you with that.

For fans of early Burzum, Darkthrone, Gothmog, Usynlig Tulmult, Drautran, and Evroklidon.

Track List:
1. Would It Be Reasonable...
2. Stop Playing With Devilry!
3. Help Me!!!
4. Alcoholic
5. Tranquility
6. Alive Corpse
7. Requital Time Shall Come
8. Evil Inside
9. Demon of Television
10. Do Good!

10 High Quality MP3 files, zipped.  Note:  you will need a program installed on your computer to able to extract the files, such as WinRar or Winzip.
